name: Truvape
overview:
We are specialists in electronic cigarette and E-liquid supply and have a team dedicated to the engineering and research of the industry. Specializing in the supply of the best electronic cigarettes and e liquid at affordable prices,we are ahead of the rest as we are able to provide the highest quality electronic cigarettes produced to the highest health and safety requirements.

E-Liquid and the Electronic Cigarette from TruVape is the modern method for smokers to enjoy all the things about smoking that they love whilst taking away those aspects of smoking that all smokers don’t really care for.

The Electronic Cigarette is made up of two component parts, a battery and the filter mouthpiece that contains e-liquid that hold nicotine. The use of the E Cig is permitted indoors and many users have felt the benefit of this alternative approach to smoking.
